title: The Call of the Wild (Part 3)
description: The rivalry between Spitz and Buck threatens to come to a head until an attack by a starving pack of huskies disrupts the entire camp. After the survivors complete a grueling run through treacherous ice fields, it's clear that it will be war between Spitz and Buck.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
comprehension: Hyphenated and Compound Words                : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
